_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 16:53:55 using v2.0
title: How has the number of staff feeling pressured to work when unwell changed by provider?
analysis_commentary: In 2012, not all trusts saw an increase in staff reporting feeling pressure to attend work when feeling unwell in previous three months; 23% of trusts saw an improvement on 2011 results, up to a maximum decrease of 7%.
data_source: Department of Health, Survey of NHS staff
